#include<cstdio>
//#include<conio.h>
#include<iostream>
#include<cmath>
#include<cstring>
#include<ctype.h>
#include<algorithm>
#include<vector>
#include<stdlib.h>
#include<map>
#include<queue>
#include<stack>
#include<set>
#include<string>

#define mod 1000000007

#define ll long long

#define rep(i,a,b) for(int i=a;i<=b;i++)
#define repex(i,a,b) for(int i=a;i<b;i++)
#define in(type,x) scanf("%" #type,&x)
#define out(type,x) printf(#x " = %" #type " ",x)
#define outln(type,x) printf(#x " = %" #type "\n",x)
#define p(type,x) printf(" %"#type" ",x)
#define fill(a,val,n) memset(a,val,n)

using namespace std;
#define maxn 10000001
bool primes[maxn];
int primecnt[maxn];

int power(int a, int b)
 {int ans=1;
  for(int i=1;i<=b;i++)
  {ans=(ans*a)%10007;
  }
  return ans;
 }

int main()
{primes[0]=primes[1]=1;
 for(int i=2;i*i<=maxn;i++)
 {if(primes[i]==0)
  {for(int j=2;j*i<=maxn;j++)
    primes[j*i]=1;
  }
 }
 rep(i,1,maxn)
 {if(primes[i]==0)
   primecnt[i]=primecnt[i-1]+1;
  else
   primecnt[i]=primecnt[i-1];
 } 
 int n;
 while((in(d,n))!=EOF)
  {
   n==1?cout<<"0\n":cout<<(power(2,primecnt[n]-1))%10007<<"\n";
  }
//getch();
return 0;
}
